title: 13 Days: The Cuban Missile Crisis
description: A tense, fast-paced, two-player game of political strategy set during the Cuban Missile Crisis.

title: 20 Second Showdown
description: A high-energy party game where two teams race to complete challenges within 20 seconds.

title: 221B Baker Street
description: A detective game where players solve cases using clues and logic, set in Sherlock Holmes' London.

title: 5 Second Rule
description: A fast-paced game where players have to name three things in a category within five seconds.

title: 5 Second Rule: Jr.
description: A junior version of the original game where younger players have to name three things in a category within five seconds.

title: 5 Second Rule: Uncensored
description: An adult version of the original game with risqu√© categories where players name three things in five seconds.

title: 5-Minute Dungeon
description: A fast-paced cooperative card game where players use quick thinking and communication to defeat dungeon monsters and bosses within 5 minutes.

title: 5-Minute MARVEL
description: A Marvel-themed version of 5-Minute Dungeon where players team up as Marvel superheroes to defeat villains and bosses within 5 minutes.

title: 7 Wonders
description: A card drafting game where players build a civilization and construct one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

title: 7 Wonders: Duel
description: A two-player version of 7 Wonders where players build civilizations and construct Wonders in a head-to-head competition.

title: 8 Minute Empire: Legends
description: A quick area control game with fantasy elements where players collect sets of cards to expand their empires.

title: 8 Minute Empire: Lost Lands
description: An expansion for 8 Minute Empire: Legends introducing new regions, cards, and mechanics.

title: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game
description: A strategic board game based on George R.R. Martin's novels where players control the Great Houses of Westeros in a bid for the Iron Throne.
expansion_packs_sequels: A Game of Thrones: A Clash of Kings
A Game of Thrones: A Storm of Swords

title: Above and Below
description: A storytelling game where players build a village above ground and explore caves below, encountering adventures and collecting resources.

title: Acquire
description: A classic economic game where players invest in hotel chains, merge companies, and build wealth.

title: Agricola
description: A complex farming game where players manage resources, build their farms, and ensure their family is fed.
expansion_packs_sequels: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small

title: Apples to Apples
description: A party game where players match nouns to adjectives in humorous or creative ways.

title: Ascension Deck Building Game
description: A fast-paced deck-building game where players recruit heroes, acquire powerful cards, and defeat monsters to gain honor points.

title: Attack of the Killer Kittens
description: A light-hearted card game where players try to avoid deadly kittens and use various cards to attack opponents.

title: Attack of the Killer Kittens (NSFW)
description: An adult version of the original game with mature content and new cards, continuing the mayhem of avoiding deadly kittens.

title: Axis & Allies: Pacific
description: A strategic World War II board game focusing on the Pacific theater, where players command naval and air forces of the Allies or the Axis powers.

title: Azul: Stained Glass of Sintra
description: A sequel to Azul where players draft glass panes to complete their stained glass windows, earning points for various patterns and arrangements.

title: Badmoji
description: A party game where players use emoji-themed cards to create phrases or sentences for others to guess.

title: Bananagrams
description: A fast-paced word game where players race to build their own crossword grid.

title: Bang!
description: A Wild West-themed card game where players take on roles of Sheriff, Deputy, Outlaw, or Renegade, with hidden roles and objectives.

title: Bang! Dice Expansion: Old Saloon
description: An expansion for Bang! The Dice Game, introducing new characters and dice with special abilities.

title: Bang! The Dice Game
description: A dice version of Bang! where players roll dice to determine actions and eliminate others in a Wild West shootout.
expansion_packs_sequels: Bang! The Dice Game: Old Saloon

title: Barenpark
description: A tile-laying game where players build their own bear parks by placing tiles to create enclosures and attractions.

title: Battle for the Island
description: A strategic board game where players compete to control territories and resources on an island.

title: Battleline
description: A two-player card game of tactical maneuvers and strategic planning, where players compete to win battles across the battlefield.

title: Battleship
description: A classic strategy game where players take turns to guess and sink each other's fleet of ships on a grid-based board.

title: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: A horror-themed cooperative board game where players explore a haunted mansion, encountering paranormal events and uncovering a traitor among them.

title: Big Boggle
description: A larger version of the classic word game Boggle, where players search for words in a grid of lettered dice.

title: Blokus
description: An abstract strategy game where players place pieces on a board, aiming to block opponents while expanding their own territory.

title: Blood Rage
description: A Viking-themed strategic board game where players draft cards, gather warriors, and compete in battles during the end of the world (Ragnar√∂k).

title: Boggle
description: A word search game where players find words in a grid of lettered dice within a time limit.

title: Brain Games
description: A collection of logic and puzzle games designed to challenge players' brains with various cognitive tasks.

title: Broom Service
description: A game of witches and druids competing to deliver potions across the land while avoiding storms.

title: Cards Against Humanity Expansions 1-4, 6
description: A party game where players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using humorous or offensive phrases printed on playing cards.

title: Camel Up
description: A camel racing and betting game where players bet on which camel will win a leg or the entire race.

title: Captain Sonar
description: A real-time strategy game where players control a submarine crew, trying to locate and destroy their opponent's submarine.

title: Carcassonne
description: A tile-placement game where players build the medieval landscape of Carcassonne by placing tiles and deploying followers to score points.

title: Cards Against Humanity
description: A party game where players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using humorous or offensive phrases printed on playing cards.

title: Cash 'n Guns
description: A party game where players take on the roles of gangsters, point foam guns at each other, and try to bluff and outmaneuver opponents to take the loot.
expansion_packs_sequels: Cash 'n Guns: More Cash 'n More Guns

title: Castle Panic
description: A cooperative tower defense game where players defend their castle against waves of monsters by coordinating their actions and resources.

title: Catan Expansion: Seafarers
description: An expansion for Catan where players explore new islands and seas, discovering resources and building settlements.

title: Catan Junior
description: A simplified version of Catan for younger players, where they collect resources to build pirate hideouts on islands and discover treasure.

title: Chameleon
description: A social deduction game where players blend in and guess a secret word without revealing their identity to the Chameleon.

title: Cheating Moth
description: A fast-paced card game where players try to get rid of their cards by breaking the rules without getting caught by the Moth.

title: Checkers
description: A classic strategy game where players move pieces diagonally on a board, aiming to capture opponents' pieces.

title: Cheer Up!
description: A party card game where players compete to make their friends laugh by playing positive or negative cards on each other.

title: Chess
description: A classic two-player strategy game where players maneuver their pieces on a board to checkmate the opponent's king.

title: Chicago Express
description: A railroad-themed economic board game where players invest in railway companies and compete to expand their network and earn profits.

title: Chinese Checkers
description: A strategy board game where players move marbles across a hexagonal board to reach the opposite triangle.

title: Chronoauts
description: A time-traveling card game where players manipulate the timeline to change history and fulfill their unique victory conditions.

title: Chronology
description: A trivia game where players must correctly place historical events in chronological order.

title: Chutes & Ladders
description: A classic children's game where players move their tokens along a path based on dice rolls, encountering ladders that advance them and chutes that set them back.

title: Citadels
description: A card game of bluffing and strategy where players build cities, hire characters, and compete to construct the most impressive citadel.

title: City of London
description: A strategic economic board game set in medieval London, where players compete to build businesses, expand influence, and gain wealth.

title: Clank! A Deck-building Adventure
description: A deck-building adventure game where players delve into a dungeon, collect artifacts, and try to escape before the dragon awakens.

title: Classic Go
description: An ancient board game where players place black and white stones on a grid to capture territory and outmaneuver opponents.

title: Clue
description: A classic mystery game where players investigate a murder by deducing the suspect, weapon, and room of the crime.

title: Clue: Bob's Burgers
description: A themed version of Clue set in the Bob's Burgers universe, where players solve mysteries in Bob's restaurant and discover who is up to no good.

title: Cockroach Poker
description: A bluffing card game where players pass unwanted cards to opponents, trying to avoid collecting sets of creepy-crawly critters.

title: Codenames Deep Undercover
description: An adult-themed version of Codenames, where players give one-word clues to help their team guess words while avoiding the opposing team's agents.

title: Codenames Duet
description: A cooperative version of Codenames for two players or more, where players give one-word clues to help their partner guess words on the grid.

title: Codenames Pictures
description: A version of Codenames where players use pictures instead of words to give clues and guess their team's cards.

title: Codenames: Disney
description: A Disney-themed version of Codenames where players give one-word clues to help their team guess characters and items from Disney movies.

title: Codenames: Harry Potter
description: A Harry Potter-themed version of Codenames where players give one-word clues to help their team guess characters, spells, and items from the Harry Potter universe.

title: Codenames: The Simpsons
description: A Simpsons-themed version of Codenames where players give one-word clues to help their team guess characters, places, and references from The Simpsons TV show.

title: Codenames
description: A word association game where players give one-word clues to help their team guess words on the board while avoiding the opposing team's words and the assassin.

title: Color Brain: Disney Edition
description: A Disney-themed trivia game where players answer questions based on colors associated with Disney characters, movies, and stories.

title: Colt Express
description: A wild west-themed board game where players act as bandits robbing a train, using action cards to move, shoot, and steal loot while avoiding the marshal.

title: Concept
description: A party game where players use icons and concepts on a board to convey words or phrases for others to guess.

title: Connect 4
description: A two-player game where players drop colored discs into a vertical grid, aiming to connect four of their own discs horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

title: Coup
description: A quick card game of bluffing and deception where players use roles to eliminate opponents and be the last one standing.

title: Coup: Reformation
description: An expansion for Coup that adds new roles and mechanics, including team play and the Inquisitor role.

title: Cranium
description: A party game where players perform various creative activities, solve puzzles, and answer trivia questions to advance on the board.

title: Crystal Clans
description: A tactical card game where players control unique clans with special abilities, deploying them to capture crystals and claim victory.

title: Cube Quest
description: A dexterity game where players flick cube-shaped units across a board to attack the opponent's king cube, aiming to be the last one standing.

title: Cyclades
description: A strategy game set in ancient Greece where players compete to build metropolises, erect temples, and enlist armies to gain favor with the gods and control islands.

title: Dead of Winter
description: A cooperative board game where players lead a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world, managing resources, facing crises, and dealing with traitors.
expansion_packs_sequels: Dead of Winter: The Long Night

title: Deadwood 1876
description: A deduction and bluffing game set in the Wild West, where players take on roles like outlaws, lawmen, or innocent bystanders to deceive others and achieve their objectives.

title: Decrypto
description: A team-based word game where players give clues to their teammates without revealing them to the opponents, aiming to intercept and decrypt the opposing team's code.

title: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)
description: A dungeon-crawling adventure board game where players explore dungeons, complete quests, and battle monsters using tactical miniatures combat.
expansion_packs_sequels: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) - Lair of the Wyrm
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) - Labyrinth of Ruin

title: Dice Forge
description: A dice-crafting game where players customize and upgrade their dice throughout the game to earn resources, complete heroic feats, and gain favor from the gods.

title: Dice Throne Season 2 - Cursed Pirate vs. Artificer
description: A fast-paced dice and card game where players battle against each other using unique character abilities and dice rolls, aiming to defeat opponents and become the champion.
expansion_packs_sequels: Dice Throne Season One: Battle Chest

title: Dice Throne Season 2 - Gunslinger vs. Samurai
description: A fast-paced dice and card game where players battle against each other using unique character abilities and dice rolls, aiming to defeat opponents and become the champion.
expansion_packs_sequels: Dice Throne Season One: Battle Chest

title: Dominion
description: A deck-building card game where players use money cards to purchase kingdom cards, building their deck to earn victory points and win the game.

title: Dominion 2nd Edition
description: A revised edition of Dominion, the deck-building card game where players compete to build the most efficient deck by acquiring cards from the central supply.

title: Dominion: Intrigue
description: An expansion for Dominion that can be played as a standalone game, introducing new kingdom cards and gameplay elements to enhance replayability.

title: Dominoes
description: A classic tile-based game where players match tiles with identical numbers of dots, scoring points by forming chains of dominoes.

title: Don't Break the Ice
description: A children's dexterity game where players take turns tapping out ice blocks one by one without causing the polar bear to fall through the ice.

title: Downforce
description: A racing game where players bid on racecars, race them on a track, and strategically play cards to move the cars forward, aiming to earn the most money from their bets.

title: Dungeon Run
description: A dungeon-crawling adventure board game where players explore, fight monsters, and collect treasure in a quest to be the first to escape the dungeon.

title: Echo of Time (Entropy Expansion)
description: An expansion for the Entropy board game, adding new cards, mechanics, and scenarios to explore the space-time continuum and alter history.

title: Elder Sign
description: A cooperative dice game set in the Lovecraftian universe where players explore a museum, complete tasks, and face off against terrifying monsters to prevent the awakening of an ancient evil.

title: Elysium
description: A strategic card-drafting game set in Greek mythology where players recruit heroes, acquire artifacts, and complete epic quests to earn prestige and become immortal.

title: Entropy
description: A strategic board game where players control factions exploring the universe, developing technologies, and competing for dominance in an ever-changing environment.

title: Everdell
description: A tableau-building and worker-placement game set in a vibrant woodland city, where players lead critters to gather resources, construct buildings, and fulfill whimsical goals.

title: Exoplanets
description: A strategic game where players create their own planetary systems, balancing habitability, resources, and discovery to earn points and dominate the galaxy.

title: Exploding Kittens
description: A fast-paced card game where players draw cards, hoping to avoid the Exploding Kitten and using various action cards to survive, eliminate opponents, and be the last one standing.

title: Five Tribes
description: A strategic board game set in a mythical Arabian land where players maneuver meeples across tiles, utilizing unique powers and strategies to gain control and earn points.
expansion_packs_sequels: Five Tribes: The Artisans of Naqala

title: Flamme Rouge
description: A tactical bicycle racing game where players manage a team of riders, use slipstreaming tactics, and strategize card play to outmaneuver opponents and cross the finish line first.

title: Flash Point: Fire Rescue
description: A cooperative game where players work as a team of firefighters, rescuing victims and extinguishing fires in a burning building, while managing limited resources and preventing the spread of fire.
expansion_packs_sequels: Flash Point: Fire Rescue - Extreme Danger

title: Forbidden Desert
description: A cooperative adventure game where players work together to survive in a desert, finding parts of a legendary flying machine while managing limited resources and battling the elements.

title: Forbidden Island
description: A cooperative adventure game where players race to collect treasures from a sinking island, working together to secure treasures and escape before the island sinks completely.

title: Formula D
description: A high-speed racing game where players roll dice to move their racecars around tracks, managing gears and risks to be the first across the finish line without crashing.

title: Fort Sumter
description: A two-player card-driven game where players reenact the events leading to the American Civil War, maneuvering for political control and military influence over Fort Sumter.

title: Founders of Gloomhaven
description: A strategy board game set in the world of Gloomhaven, where players build the city of Gloomhaven itself, managing resources, trade routes, and infrastructures to develop the city.

title: Gaia Project
description: A strategic board game set in space where players colonize planets, research technologies, and expand their civilizations to dominate the galaxy by accumulating the most victory points.

title: Get Bit!
description: A fast-paced card game where players control robots escaping from a shark, trying to avoid being bitten by losing limbs and using cards to outrun others until only one robot remains intact.

title: Ghost Blitz
description: A fast-paced reaction game where players grab the correct item based on a card's clues, testing reflexes and visual perception in a race to collect the most points.

title: Gizmos
description: An engine-building game where players construct machines and chain reactions using energy marbles to create powerful combinations and earn points.

title: Gobblet Gobblers
description: A strategic board game for young players where they place and move gobblers of different sizes in a 3D grid, aiming to line up three gobblers in a row to win.

title: Gravwell
description: A tactical racing game where players navigate their ships through a chaotic space warp, using cards to manipulate movement and escape the gravitational pull of a black hole.

title: Guess Who?
description: A classic deduction game where players ask yes-or-no questions to guess the opponent's character card by eliminating possibilities based on facial features.

title: Guillotine
description: A card game where players compete to collect the heads of nobles during the French Revolution, strategically playing action cards to manipulate the line and gain the most points.

title: Haiclue
description: A word game where players guess words based on clues given by their teammates using special letter tiles, aiming to deduce the correct word and score points.

title: Hail Hydra
description: A social deduction game set in the Marvel Universe where players are either S.H.I.E.L.D. agents or Hydra operatives, working together or betraying each other to accomplish their secret goals.

title: Hamsterrolle
description: A dexterity game where players balance and stack wooden pieces to create a path for a hamster wheel, navigating obstacles and collecting food tokens to win.

title: Hanabi
description: A cooperative card game where players work together to create a spectacular firework display, communicating through limited clues to play cards in the correct order.

title: Head Hackers
description: A strategic deck-building game where players control teams of hackers competing to infiltrate and control the minds of cyborgs, using tactics and technology to achieve dominance.

title: Hey, That's My Fish!
description: A strategic tile-laying game where players control penguins trying to collect the most fish from a shrinking iceberg, blocking opponents and navigating the board's changing landscape.

title: Hive
description: An abstract strategy game where players use insect-themed tiles to build and maneuver their hive, aiming to surround the opponent's queen bee while preventing their own from being surrounded.

title: Hive Carbon
description: A portable version of the abstract strategy game Hive, featuring carbon pieces that are durable and travel-friendly, maintaining the same gameplay mechanics of insect-themed tile placement and movement.

title: ICECOOL
description: A dexterity game where players flick penguin-shaped pieces through rooms of a school, aiming to collect fish and avoid being caught by the hall monitor in this fun-filled, penguin-themed game.

title: Illimat
description: A strategy card game with a vintage aesthetic, combining mechanics of collecting and manipulating cards around a rotating field to control seasons and gather points in a mysterious game of skill.

title: Imhotep: The Duel
description: A two-player version of the popular board game Imhotep, where players compete to build monuments by transporting stones on ships and strategically placing them to earn points and outmaneuver their opponent.

title: Incohearant
description: A party game where players decipher phrases that sound like everyday sayings but are actually garbled and nonsensical, relying on humor and wit to guess the correct phrases and earn points.

title: Istanbul
description: A strategy board game where players are merchants navigating the bustling markets of Istanbul, managing resources and using their assistants to collect goods and fulfill orders in a race to earn the most rubies.

title: Jaipur
description: A fast-paced card game where players are traders in the city of Jaipur, competing to collect and sell goods such as spices, textiles, and gems to earn the most profit and gain the favor of the Maharaja.

title: Jamaica
description: A racing board game where players sail their ships around Jamaica, navigating hazards, collecting treasures, and using cards strategically to move forward in a quest to be the first pirate to complete the circuit and claim victory.

title: Jaws
description: A thematic board game based on the classic movie, where one player takes on the role of the shark while others play as characters trying to capture or escape the deadly predator.

title: Kahuna 2-Player Game
description: An abstract strategy game where players compete to control islands in the South Pacific by placing bridges and removing opponent's bridges, using tactical maneuvers to dominate the archipelago.

title: Keyflower
description: A strategy game where players build their villages using hexagonal tiles, manage resources, and bid for tiles with seasonal workers, aiming to develop the most prosperous and efficient community.

title: Killer Bunnies
description: A chaotic card game where players control bunnies aiming to collect carrots and use wacky weapons against opponents, with the unpredictable nature of card draws adding to the hilarity and strategy.
expansion_packs_sequels: Killer Bunnies and the Quest for the Magic Carrot

title: King of New York
description: A fast-paced dice game and sequel to King of Tokyo, where players control giant monsters battling each other and military forces while trying to dominate Manhattan and earn points through dice manipulation.
expansion_packs_sequels: King of New York: Power Up!

title: King of Tokyo
description: A dice-based board game where players control monsters competing to become the King of Tokyo by attacking rivals, healing wounds, and gaining power-ups in a fast-paced battle for supremacy.

title: King of Tokyo: Dark Edition
description: A darker and more strategic version of King of Tokyo, featuring enhanced components and gameplay twists, where players control monstrous characters vying for supremacy over Tokyo through dice combat and power-ups.

title: Lanterns
description: A tile-placement game where players decorate the palace lake with floating lanterns, earning honor by matching colors and dedicating lantern sets, balancing strategy and harmony in this visually stunning game.

title: Le Havre
description: An economic strategy game where players manage resources and construct buildings in the French port city of Le Havre, competing to build the most prosperous harbor while navigating the challenges of maritime trade.

title: Legendary: A Marvel Deck-building game
description: A deck-building game set in the Marvel Comics universe where players recruit heroes, build decks, and defeat villains in a cooperative effort to save the world from evil masterminds and their schemes.

title: Lewis & Clark
description: A strategy board game where players lead expeditions through the American wilderness, navigating rivers, trading with Native American tribes, and managing resources to reach the Pacific Coast first.
expansion_packs_sequels: Lewis & Clark: The Expedition ‚Äì Discoveries Cards

title: LINKEE
description: A trivia-based party game where players solve puzzles to find the link between four trivia questions, aiming to be the first to correctly identify the common theme and shout 'LINKEE!' to win.

title: Lords of Vegas
description: A board game where players are casino magnates building and expanding casinos on the Las Vegas Strip, competing to control the most valuable casinos through dice rolling, strategic investments, and takeovers.

title: Lords of Waterdeep
description: A strategy board game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe where players assume the roles of secret rulers of the city of Waterdeep, recruiting adventurers to complete quests and expand their influence.
expansion_packs_sequels: Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport

title: Love Letter
description: A quick and elegant card game where players compete to deliver their love letters to the princess, using deduction and bluffing to outwit opponents and eliminate them from the game.

title: Machi Koro
description: A fast-paced city-building game where players develop their cities by rolling dice to earn income, construct buildings, and compete to complete landmarks first, strategically managing resources and investments.

title: Mage Wars
description: A tactical card game where players become powerful mages battling in an arena, using spell cards to summon creatures, cast spells, and strategically outmaneuver opponents in a duel to the death.

title: Magic Maze
description: A real-time, cooperative board game where players silently coordinate to guide heroes through a shopping mall, exploring and escaping guards' lines of sight to collect items and complete objectives under strict time limits.

title: Mancala
description: An ancient board game played worldwide where players strategically move seeds or stones around pits, aiming to capture opponents' pieces and control the most pits, emphasizing skillful planning and foresight.

title: Mansions of Madness
description: A cooperative horror board game set in the Lovecraftian universe, where players investigate mysteries and face eldritch horrors in eerie mansions using app-driven mechanics and immersive storytelling.
expansion_packs_sequels: Mansions of Madness: Beyond the Threshold
Mansions of Madness: Streets of Arkham

title: Marvel Champions: The Card Game
description: A cooperative living card game where players become Marvel superheroes, assembling decks of cards representing iconic heroes to battle villains, complete scenarios, and save the world from evil schemes.
expansion_packs_sequels: Marvel Champions: The Green Goblin Scenario Pack
Marvel Champions: The Wrecking Crew Scenario Pack

title: Mascarade
description: A party game of hidden roles and deception where players swap identities, bluff about their roles, and attempt to deduce who they are in a lively and unpredictable masquerade setting.

title: Maskarades
description: A party game where players act out words and phrases using masks, aiming to guess as many correct answers as possible within the time limit, promoting creativity and laughter in a theatrical atmosphere.

title: Mastermind
description: A classic code-breaking board game where one player creates a secret code and the other player tries to deduce the correct combination of colors or symbols through logical deduction and strategic guessing.

title: Memoir '44
description: A World War II-themed board game where players command troops, recreate historical battles, and use strategic cards to simulate key engagements on detailed maps, capturing the drama and tactics of warfare.

title: Mice and Mystics
description: A cooperative adventure game where players assume the roles of heroic mice battling evil creatures in a fantasy setting, embarking on quests, and overcoming challenges using storytelling and tactical combat.
expansion_packs_sequels: Mice and Mystics: Heart of Glorm

title: Mille Bornes
description: A classic French card game where players compete in a road race, playing distance cards, hazards, and remedies to reach 1,000 kilometers first while sabotaging opponents and avoiding roadblocks.

title: Mint Delivery
description: A light pick-up and deliver game where players drive trucks to deliver mints to various locations, using an innovative mint box tin as the game's central component, offering accessible gameplay with strategic depth.

title: Mint Works
description: A portable worker placement game where players manage a mint factory, using workers to acquire mints, upgrade facilities, and outmaneuver opponents, offering strategic depth in a small, pocket-sized package.

title: Monikers
description: A party game where players describe famous people using specific rules in round 1, using only one word in round 2, and acting out the person in round 3.

title: Monopoly
description: A classic board game where players buy, trade, and develop properties to become the wealthiest player, dealing with financial challenges and strategic decisions to dominate the real estate market.

title: Monopoly Deal
description: A fast-paced card game version of Monopoly where players collect sets of properties and action cards to bankrupt opponents, using strategic plays and negotiation to win.

title: Monopoly: California, Here we come!
description: A custom edition of Monopoly featuring California-themed properties and elements, allowing players to buy and trade famous Californian landmarks and locations.

title: Monopoly: Doctor Who
description: A custom edition of Monopoly featuring Doctor Who-themed properties and elements, allowing players to buy and trade iconic locations and characters from the Doctor Who universe.

title: Monopoly: Frozen II
description: A custom edition of Monopoly featuring Frozen II-themed properties and elements, allowing players to buy and trade locations and characters from the Frozen II movie.

title: Monopoly: Gamer
description: A custom edition of Monopoly featuring Nintendo characters and gameplay elements, introducing power-up abilities and boss battles for a unique gaming experience.

title: Monopoly: The America
description: A custom edition of Monopoly celebrating American landmarks, culture, and history, featuring themed properties and tokens representing iconic American symbols.

title: Monopoly: The Walking Dead
description: A custom edition of Monopoly featuring The Walking Dead-themed properties and elements, allowing players to buy and trade iconic locations and characters from the TV series.

title: Monopoly for Millennials
description: A custom edition of Monopoly targeting millennials, featuring modern twists such as renting experiences, avoiding real estate, and collecting experiences instead of properties.

title: Munchkin
description: A humorous card game where players explore dungeons, fight monsters, and backstab their friends to level up and reach level 10 first, using quirky cards and humorous interactions.

title: Munchkin Fu
description: A martial arts-themed version of Munchkin where players kick down doors, battle monsters, and grab loot to gain levels and win, featuring humorous martial arts tropes and quirky gameplay.

title: Munchkin Quest
description: A board game version of Munchkin where players explore dungeons, battle monsters, and collect loot to reach level 10 and win, featuring modular boards and competitive gameplay.

title: Munchkin: Rick and Morty
description: A themed version of Munchkin featuring characters and themes from the Rick and Morty animated series, where players battle enemies, complete quests, and betray friends in typical Munchkin fashion.

title: Mysterium
description: A cooperative deduction game where players solve a murder mystery using abstract artwork and intuitive clues, with one player as a ghost providing visions to guide the investigators.

title: Mythotopia
description: A strategy card game set in a mythological world where players expand their kingdoms, recruit armies, and conquer territories to gain victory points, blending area control with deck-building mechanics.

title: New York Slice
description: A tile-drafting and set-collection game where players slice pizzas and strategically choose slices to score points, aiming to have the most valuable collection of pizza slices by game end.

title: No Thanks!
description: A fast-paced card game where players bid to avoid collecting cards and penalties, with each turn offering a strategic decision to take a card or pass, aiming to have the lowest score at game end.

title: OK
description: A tile-laying game where players place tiles to form a 5x5 grid and score points based on the symbols and colors connected, offering simple rules with strategic depth and quick gameplay.

title: One Deck Dungeon
description: A dungeon crawling adventure card game where players explore dungeons, defeat monsters, and collect loot using dice and cards to progress through levels and face final bosses.
expansion_packs_sequels: One Deck Dungeon: Forest of Shadows

title: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
description: A fast-paced social deduction game where players take on roles of villagers or werewolves, using bluffing, deduction, and manipulation to identify and eliminate opponents during a single night.
expansion_packs_sequels: One Night Ultimate Werewolf: Bonus Pack 1

title: Operation
description: A dexterity game where players perform 'surgery' on a patient using tweezers, attempting to remove ailments without touching the edges and setting off the buzzer.

title: Othello
description: An abstract strategy board game where players take turns placing discs on a board to trap and flip their opponent's discs to their own color, aiming to have the most discs of their color at the end of the game.

title: Out of the Woods
description: A cooperative storytelling adventure game where players journey through a dark forest, making choices that shape their narrative and encountering various challenges and mysteries along the way.

title: Pagoda
description: An abstract strategy game where players compete to build the most beautiful pagodas by carefully placing tiles and acquiring special abilities to outwit opponents and earn the Emperor's favor.

title: Pandemic
description: A cooperative board game where players work together as disease-fighting specialists, traveling the world to treat infections and prevent outbreaks, striving to discover cures before time runs out.

title: Parcheesi: Royal Edition
description: A classic race game where players move their pawns around the board based on dice rolls, racing to get all their pawns into the center home space while hindering opponents by landing on their pawns.

title: Partners
description: A partnership card game where players bid, win tricks, and communicate with their partners to earn points, using strategic play and cooperation to outscore opponents.

title: Patchwork
description: An abstract strategy game where players compete to build the most aesthetically pleasing patchwork quilt by strategically placing tetris-like fabric pieces, balancing time, buttons, and space.

title: Pictionary
description: A classic party game where players draw clues and teammates guess what they're drawing, racing against the clock to guess correctly and advance on the game board, using creativity and quick thinking.

title: Pirate Fluxx
description: A variant of Fluxx where players change the rules and goals as they play, themed around pirates with humorous twists, featuring constant rule changes and unpredictable gameplay.

title: PIT
description: A fast-paced trading game where players trade commodities in a frenzied pit-trading environment, aiming to corner the market on specific commodities and ring the bell to win.

title: Point Salad
description: A card-drafting and set-collection game where players draft vegetable cards to collect sets and create scoring combinations, balancing between collecting high-scoring vegetables and salad dressing cards.

title: Power Grid
description: An economic strategy game where players compete to build the best network of power plants and supply cities with electricity, balancing resource management and expansion to earn the most money.

title: Puerto Rico
description: A classic economic strategy game where players build plantations and buildings in Puerto Rico, managing resources, shipping goods, and trading to earn points, balancing multiple strategies to victory.

title: Quacks of Quedlinburg
description: A bag-building and push-your-luck game where players are quack doctors making potions, pulling ingredients from their bags to create powerful brews and avoid exploding their cauldrons.
expansion_packs_sequels: Quacks of Quedlinburg: The Herb Witches

title: Queendomino
description: A tile-laying and kingdom-building game where players expand their kingdoms by placing domino-like tiles, gaining resources, constructing buildings, and earning points to become the wealthiest kingdom.

title: Quiddler
description: A word game where players create words from their hand of cards, using strategy to arrange cards into words of increasing length and scoring points based on the length of the words formed.

title: Qwirkle
description: A tile-placement and pattern-recognition game where players match colors and shapes to score points by placing tiles to form lines of matching attributes, with strategic depth and family-friendly gameplay.

title: Race for the Galaxy
description: A card game of galactic conquest where players build civilizations by playing cards to develop worlds, exploit resources, and settle new planets, aiming to build the most prosperous space empire.
expansion_packs_sequels: Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Race for the Galaxy: Alien Artifacts

title: Ramen Fury
description: A fast-paced card game where players compete to complete ramen bowls by collecting ingredient cards, stealing from opponents, and using action cards to create the best ramen combinations.

title: Raptor
description: A two-player asymmetrical game where one player controls a team of scientists trying to capture baby raptors, while the other player controls the raptors, aiming to either escape or eliminate the scientists.

title: Rhino Hero
description: A stacking and balancing game where players build a tower of cards, using walls and roofs, while moving a superhero rhino figure upwards without toppling the tower.

title: Rick and Morty: Total Rickall
description: A cooperative deduction game based on the Rick and Morty series, where players must identify and eliminate parasitic characters from a deck, avoiding shooting real characters.

title: Rising Sun
description: A strategic board game set in feudal Japan, focusing on diplomacy, warfare, and honor as players control different clans vying for power and influence in a dynamic political landscape.

title: Risk
description: A classic strategy board game of global domination where players command armies, conquer territories, and engage in epic battles to achieve world conquest, with elements of strategy and luck.

title: Risk Godstorm
description: A variant of Risk set in the ancient world with mythological elements, where players take control of ancient civilizations and mythical creatures to conquer territories and achieve domination.

title: Rock & Roll Party Game
description: A music-themed party game where players perform challenges related to rock and roll trivia, music knowledge, and performative tasks to earn points and showcase their musical prowess.

title: Roll for the Galaxy
description: A dice-based strategy game where players build space empires by managing resources, exploring planets, and developing technologies, using custom dice to represent workers and resources.

title: Root
description: An asymmetrical strategy game where players take on the roles of woodland creatures, each with unique abilities and goals, competing for control and dominance over a forest.

title: Rummikub
description: A tile-based game that combines elements of rummy and mahjong, where players aim to be the first to use all their tiles by forming sets and runs.

title: Sagrada
description: A dice-drafting and placement game where players compete to build beautiful stained glass windows by selecting colorful dice and placing them according to specific placement rules.

title: Samurai Spirit
description: A cooperative game where players defend a village from bandits as samurai warriors, using teamwork and strategy to protect the village while managing their spirit and resources.

title: San Juan
description: A card game adaptation of the board game Puerto Rico, where players develop the city of San Juan by constructing buildings, producing goods, and trading for victory points.
expansion_packs_sequels: San Juan: The New Buildings and The Events

title: Santorini
description: An abstract strategy game where players build and move around a 3D board to construct buildings on the island of Santorini, aiming to reach the top level before their opponent.
expansion_packs_sequels: Santorini: New York Promo Card Pack

title: Say Anything
description: A party game where players answer open-ended questions and others vote for the best or most amusing answer, encouraging creativity and humor.

title: Scattergories
description: A word-based party game where players roll a die to determine categories and must quickly think of words starting with a specific letter that fit those categories, racing against a timer.

title: Schmovie
description: A party game where players create movie titles for absurd film scenarios, using humorous wordplay and creativity to win awards and become the best schmovie maker.
expansion_packs_sequels: Schmovie: The Hilarious Game of Made-Up Movies!

title: Scotland Yard
description: A deduction and strategy game where players take on the roles of detectives chasing Mr. X, a criminal moving secretly through London, using clues and teamwork to track him down.

title: Scrabble
description: A classic word game where players score points by forming words with letter tiles on a crossword-style grid, using vocabulary and strategy to maximize their score.

title: Seasons
description: A fantasy-themed card game where players assume the roles of sorcerers competing in a magical tournament, using cards to gather energy, cast spells, and summon creatures to gain points.

title: Secret Hitler
description: A social deduction game set in pre-World War II Germany, where players are secretly divided into fascists and liberals, with the fascists trying to elect Hitler as chancellor while the liberals attempt to stop them.

title: Sentinels of the Multiverse
description: A cooperative superhero card game where players take on the roles of comic book heroes fighting against a powerful villain in dynamic environments, using unique powers and abilities to save the world.
expansion_packs_sequels: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Rook City
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Shattered Timelines

title: Sequence
description: A combination card and board game where players aim to create sequences of five chips in a row on the board while strategically blocking opponents, using cards that correspond to spaces on the board.

title: SET
description: A card game where players identify sets of three cards based on shape, color, number, and shading, testing their perception and pattern recognition skills.
expansion_packs_sequels: SET: The Family Game of Visual Perception

title: Settlers of Catan
description: A pioneering game in modern board gaming, where players collect resources, build settlements and cities, and trade to become the dominant civilization on the island of Catan.

title: Sheriff of Nottingham
description: A bluffing and negotiation game where players take turns being the Sheriff and inspecting each other's bags of goods, deciding whether to enforce customs laws or accept bribes.
expansion_packs_sequels: Sheriff of Nottingham: Merry Men Expansion

title: Sketchy Stories
description: A party game where players draw pictures based on prompts and try to guess each other's sketches, using creativity and imagination to create hilarious and unique drawings.

title: Skull
description: A bluffing game where players bid on how many cards they can flip without revealing a skull, testing their memory and intuition to avoid losing points.

title: Small World
description: A fantasy board game where players control various fantasy races and vie for control of a world that's too small to accommodate them all, using special abilities and strategy to conquer territories.

title: Smart Ass
description: A fast-paced trivia game where players shout out answers to clues, racing to be the first 'Smart Ass' to correctly identify the person, place, or thing being described.

title: Smash Up
description: A shufflebuilding game where players combine two unique factions (like pirates, zombies, ninjas, and more) to smash their way to victory by breaking bases and outwitting opponents.

title: Sorry!
description: A classic board game where players move their pawns around the board, aiming to send opponents' pawns back to the start while racing to reach home first.

title: Spank the Yeti
description: A party game where players pair up bizarre actions with even stranger scenarios, trying to guess how their teammates will respond to earn points by matching answers.

title: Spirit Island
description: A cooperative game where players take on the roles of spirits protecting their island home from invaders, using powers and elemental forces to drive away colonizers.

title: Splendor
description: A strategy game where players are gem merchants collecting and trading gems to acquire mines, transportation, and artisans in order to become the most prestigious merchant of the Renaissance.

title: Spot It!
description: A fast-paced card game where players race to match symbols between cards, testing their observational skills and reflexes in various mini-games.

title: Spot It!: Frozen II
description: A themed version of the fast-paced card game Spot It!, featuring characters and elements from Disney's Frozen II. Players race to match symbols between cards in various mini-games.

title: Spyfall
description: A social deduction game where players take on roles at a location, with one player being the spy who must deduce the location while others ask and answer questions to identify the spy.

title: Star Fluxx
description: A card game where the rules and goals are constantly changing as players play cards to change the game's conditions and win conditions.

title: Star Traders
description: A strategic board game where players take on the roles of space traders competing to acquire resources, planets, and technologies in a universe full of opportunities and dangers.

title: Star Trek Panic
description: A cooperative board game based on the Star Trek universe, where players work together to complete missions and defend the starship Enterprise from various threats.

title: Stone Age
description: A worker placement game set in the Stone Age, where players allocate resources and workers to gather food, build tools, and construct buildings to develop their tribe.

title: Stop Thief!
description: A cooperative deduction game where players use an electronic device to track down a thief moving around the city, relying on audio clues and strategy to catch the culprit.

title: Stratego
description: A classic strategy board game where players command an army and attempt to capture the opponent's flag while hiding their own flag and deploying various pieces with different ranks and abilities.

title: Super Hazard Quest
description: A fast-paced card game where players venture through dangerous dungeons, battling monsters and collecting loot to become the ultimate hero.

title: Survive: Escape from Atlantis
description: A classic survival board game where players try to evacuate their explorers from an island sinking into the ocean, while avoiding sea monsters and disasters.

title: Sushi Go
description: A quick and fun card-drafting game where players pick sushi dishes to create the best meal combinations, aiming to score the most points.

title: Taboo
description: A party word game where players try to get their teammates to guess a word without using certain 'taboo' words or phrases in their clues.

title: Takenoko
description: A beautifully illustrated board game where players cultivate bamboo, grow plots, and feed a hungry panda while completing various objectives for points.

title: Tara
description: An abstract strategy board game where players compete to control territories on a modular board by strategically placing their pieces and removing opponents' pieces.

title: Telestrations
description: A party game where players draw sketches based on words or phrases, then pass their sketchbooks along for others to guess, resulting in hilarious and often misinterpreted drawings.

title: Telestrations: After Dark
description: An adult version of Telestrations, featuring risqu√© prompts and themes suitable for mature audiences, maintaining the original game's drawing and guessing mechanics.

title: Terraforming Mars
description: A strategy game where players manage resources and terraform Mars by raising temperature, oxygen level, and ocean coverage, while competing for the most points through project cards and achievements.

title: Thanos Rising
description: A cooperative dice and card game where players recruit heroes and assemble a team to defeat Thanos and his forces, utilizing unique powers and strategies to survive and win.

title: The Fox in the Forest
description: A two-player trick-taking card game where players use special abilities of fairy tale characters to win tricks and score points, with a unique scoring system encouraging strategic play.
expansion_packs_sequels: The Fox in the Forest Duet

title: The Game of Life
description: A classic family board game where players navigate through life's major milestones, making decisions that impact their career, family, and finances.
expansion_packs_sequels: The Game of Life: Twists & Turns
The Game of Life: Adventures Edition

title: The Great Heartland
description: A strategic board game where players compete to develop and manage farms across the heartland of America, focusing on crop management and efficient resource allocation.

title: The Metagame
description: A party game where players use cards to argue about the cultural impact, personal significance, and historical importance of various games, films, and media.

title: The Mind
description: A unique cooperative card game where players must play cards from their hand in ascending order without communicating verbally, relying solely on intuition and non-verbal cues.

title: The Resistance
description: A social deduction game where players are members of the Resistance fighting against a government regime, with spies among them trying to sabotage missions covertly.

title: The Werewolves of Millers Hollow
description: A social deduction game where players take on roles of villagers or werewolves, trying to uncover each other's identities through accusations and nighttime actions.
expansion_packs_sequels: Werewolves of Millers Hollow: The Pact

title: The Game of Wolf
description: A trivia party game where players answer questions, take risks, and bet on their opponents' answers, aiming to collect the most points and win rounds.

title: Ticket to Ride
description: A classic railway-themed board game where players collect train cards to claim railway routes across a map, aiming to complete destination tickets for points.
expansion_packs_sequels: Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 1 ‚Äì Team Asia & Legendary Asia
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 2 ‚Äì India & Switzerland
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 3 ‚Äì The Heart of Africa
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 4 ‚Äì Nederland
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 5 ‚Äì United Kingdom & Pennsylvania
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 6 ‚Äì France & Old West

title: Timeline
description: A card game where players place historical events in chronological order on a timeline, testing their knowledge and intuition about when key moments in history occurred.

title: Tokyo Metro
description: A board game where players compete to build the most profitable train routes in Tokyo, balancing between expanding their network, investing in properties, and manipulating stock prices.

title: Trapwords
description: A word-based party game where teams try to guess words while avoiding trapwords set by the opposing team, leading to hilarious and strategic gameplay.

title: Treason in the Tower
description: A social deduction game set in the Tower of London, where players take on the roles of historical figures trying to uncover traitors while protecting their own secrets.

title: Trivial Pursuit
description: A classic trivia game where players answer questions from various categories to collect wedges and complete their pie-shaped game piece.

title: Trouble
description: A classic race-and-chase game where players move their pieces around the board based on the outcome of dice rolls, aiming to be the first to get all their pieces home.

title: Tsuro
description: A tile-laying game where players build paths on a board, guiding their dragon tokens to stay on the board longer than their opponents.

title: Twilight Struggle
description: A two-player game simulating the Cold War, where players compete as the United States and the Soviet Union, navigating political events and military operations.

title: Unexploded Cow
description: A humorous card game where players are trying to save London from unexploded cows left over from WWII, collecting money by defusing these unusual bombs.

title: Unlock Adventures!
description: A cooperative card-based escape room game where players solve puzzles and uncover clues to escape from various scenarios within a time limit.

title: Uno
description: A classic shedding-type card game where players match colors or numbers to discard all their cards, with special action cards adding strategic twists.

title: UNO Flip
description: A version of Uno where cards have a 'dark side' and 'light side', with the ability to flip the entire deck to change the direction of play and introduce new challenges.

title: UNO Frozen 2
description: A themed version of Uno featuring characters and elements from the Disney movie Frozen 2, with special cards inspired by the film.

title: Unstable Unicorns
description: A strategic card game where players build a unicorn army to betray their friends, gathering unicorns, magical upgrades, and sabotaging opponents to win.

title: Vault of Dragons
description: A board game adaptation set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe where players control competing factions vying for control of the Vault of Dragons in Waterdeep.

title: Via Nebula
description: A strategic game where players rebuild a mystical land, clearing fog and building routes to collect resources and complete contracts.

title: Viceroy
description: A card-drafting game where players compete to assemble powerful character cards and artifacts to gain the most influence points and become the next Viceroy.

title: Villainous
description: A game where players take on the role of Disney villains, each with their own objectives to complete and unique abilities to use against opponents.

title: Visitor
description: A social deduction game where players must figure out who among them is the alien Visitor, while the Visitor tries to sabotage the humans' efforts.

title: Weird Things Humans Search For
description: A party game where players must guess the most popular internet searches based on incomplete questions, showcasing the weirdest and funniest queries.

title: Welcome to the Dungeon
description: A push-your-luck game where players take turns daring each other to go into a dungeon with less equipment, hoping to emerge victorious or force others to do so.

title: What Came First
description: A trivia game where players must guess which of two events came first in history, covering a wide range of topics and historical events.

title: Wildlands
description: A skirmish board game where players control factions of fantasy characters, using tactical movement and combat to control ancient crystals.

title: Wits & Wagers
description: A trivia game where players bet on which answers are closest to the correct one, making it accessible and fun for all ages.

title: Wu Wei: Journey of the Changing Path
description: An abstract strategy game where players control elemental monks, manipulating the paths of energy to achieve harmony and enlightenment.

title: Yahtzee
description: A classic dice game where players roll dice to score points based on various combinations, aiming to achieve high scores with strategic choices.

title: You Bet-Cha!
description: A betting party game where players bet on how others will complete challenges, combining knowledge of friends with strategic betting to win.

title: Zombie Dice
description: A fast-paced dice game where players take on the role of zombies trying to eat brains without getting shot by the survivors.

title: Zombicide
description: A cooperative survival game where players must work together to survive zombie hordes, collecting weapons and completing objectives.
